foreignData.name: Überwucherter Mauerbogen
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
{T}: Du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{2}, opfere den Überwucherten Mauerbogen: Lerne eine Lektion. (Du kannst entweder eine Lektion-Karte von außerhalb der Partie, die du besitzt, offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen oder eine Karte abwerfen, um eine Karte zu ziehen.)

foreignData.name: Arco cubierto de vegetación
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
{T}: Ganas 1 vida.
{2}, sacrificar el Arco cubierto de vegetación: Aprende. (Puedes mostrar una carta de Lección de la cual eres propietario de fuera del juego y ponerla en tu mano o descartar una carta para robar una carta.)

foreignData.name: Arche luxuriante
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
{T} : Vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{2}, sacrifiez l'Arche luxuriante : Apprenez. (Vous pouvez révéler une carte de leçon que vous possédez en dehors de la partie et la mettre dans votre main, ou vous défausser d'une carte pour piocher une carte.)

foreignData.name: Arco Rigoglioso
foreignData.text:
Difensore
{T}: Guadagni 1 punto vita.
{2}, Sacrifica l'Arco Rigoglioso: Apprendi. (Puoi rivelare una carta Lezione che possiedi al di fuori della partita e aggiungerla alla tua mano o scartare una carta per pescare una carta.)

foreignData.name: 草むした拱門
foreignData.text:
防衛
{T}：あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{2}, 草むした拱門を生け贄に捧げる：履修を行う。（あなたは、ゲームの外部からあなたがオーナーである講義・カード１枚を公開しあなたの手札に加えるか、カード１枚を捨てカード１枚を引くか、どちらかを行ってもよい。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 植物・壁

foreignData.name: 뒤덮인 아치
foreignData.text:
수비태세
{T}: 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{2}, 뒤덮인 아치를 희생한다: 학습한다. (당신은 게임 밖에서 당신이 소유한 수업 카드 한 장을 공개하고 그 카드를 당신의 손에 넣거나, 카드 한 장을 버린 후 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Arco Encoberto
foreignData.text:
Defensor
{T}: Você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{2}, sacrifique Arco Encoberto: Aprenda. (Você pode revelar um card de Lição seu de fora do jogo e colocá-lo em sua mão, ou descartar um card para comprar um card.)

foreignData.name: Заросшая Арка
foreignData.text:
Защитник
{T}: вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{2}, пожертвуйте Заросшую Арку: выучите урок. (Вы можете показать принадлежащую вам карту Урока вне игры и положить ее в вашу руку, или вы можете сбросить карту, чтобы взять карту.)

foreignData.name: 蔓生植拱
foreignData.text:
守军
{T}：你获得1点生命。
{2}，牺牲蔓生植拱：温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

foreignData.name: 蔓生植拱
foreignData.text:
守軍
{T}：你獲得1點生命。
{2}，犧牲蔓生植拱：溫習。（你可以從遊戲外展示一張由你擁有的課程牌並置於你手上，或棄一張牌來抽一張牌。）

name: Overgrown Arch
originalText:
Defender
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{2}, Sacrifice Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

rulings.text: If a card is brought into the game from outside the game, it will stay in the game until it ends or until its owner leaves the game, whichever comes first.

If you bring a card into the game from outside the game in a Constructed tournament (or a Constructed game played under tournament conditions), you may select only a card from your sideboard. In casual Constructed games, the card comes from your collection.
If you bring a card into the game from outside the game in a Sealed Deck or Booster Draft event, you may select only a card that is in the card pool that you built your deck from.
If instructed to learn, you may do nothing. Discarding a card and putting a Lesson card into your hand are both optional.

text:
Defender
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{2}, Sacrifice Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
